discourse_list.title: Stats on the State of Maker 04 - Liquidations are up as the market corrects

content.content: Thanks for checking out this update on the state and growth of Maker!  Highlights @Primoz prepared an excellent report on the vaults that have been liquidated this year: MakerDAO FLIP Auction Stats. With over 300 auctions initiated this past week due to the correction in the cryptocurrency market, this report is extra timely!  Dai Dai Price: $0.992545 Circulating Dai / Debt Ceiling / Utilization: 2,317,484,217 / 2,720,394,469 / 85.19% Total Collateral / Collateralization: 5,723,990,017 / 246.99% DAI-ly Active Addresses  Daily Active Addresses1912×679 99.7 KB   Sources  CoinGecko Dai Stats Graphs by Santiment   Vaults Open Vaults: 21,454 Stability Fees (owed): 57,120,742 Liquidations Initiated (2/20 - 2/26): 312  Sources  DeFi Explore   MKR Current Price: $1,968.43 Market Capitalization: $1,787,726,675 MKR Supply: 995,238 MKR Burned (Total / Initial Supply): 4,761.22 / 100,000,000 Surplus Buffer (Now / To burn MKR / est’d time): 19,624,183 / 30,000,000 / 46.57 days Annual Burn (estimated): 38,369 MKR  Sources  CoinGecko Maker Burn   Governance Executive Votes (Past week): 1 View Votes Governance Polls: 12 View Polls  More Stats? Feedback is appreciated!
